name: Extreme Roof Drive
description:
Extreme Roof Drive is about showing some furious rooftop shadow stunt while enjoying real bike physics on vast city roads. Jump high in the air through ramp placed on city roads. Enjoy Rooftop bike adventure, move from building to building without falling on the ground and perform some daring stunts! Each level in Extreme Roof Drive is challenging and exciting than the other. All you need to have is perfect balance, riding skills and controls as you drive across the ramps, city traffic rush and other obstacles.

There are amazing bikes that you can select and unlock. Play this furious rooftop stunt simulator game and show your super extreme rooftop bike stunt riding skills. Get ready for an amazing stunt drift riding adventure on grand city roads and prove that you are the real trail bike racer.


FEATURES:
Realistic physics of bike stunt games
Reverse timer so be as fast as possible
Challenging crazy stunt levels
Bike riding experience on tough building roofs
Smooth steering control with realistic physics
